name: AIC
description: Atal Incubation Centre-JK Lakshmipat University is established with the support of AIM, NITI Aayog and JK Lakshmipat University in 2019. In the last 4 years, AIC-JKLU has supported 55 startups in various sectors including Fintech, Ed-tech, EVs Agritech and more.

name: Rang Mastaaney
description: Rang mastaaney has been operational for nearly 13 years, during which they have staged over 65 plays and produced more than 250 stage performances, along with over 1000 street performances of 'Ab Bas.' Notably Rangmastaaney stands out as the only theater group in the country to have presented 7 Different plays by same Team over 4 consecutive days in Alwar
